hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha, Ummul Mu'minin: May Allah have mercy on the early immigrant women. When the verse "That they should draw their veils over their bosoms" was revealed, they tore their thick outer garments and made veils from them

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي قَوْلِهِ تَعَالَى { وَلْيَضْرِبْنَ بِخُمُرِهِنَّ عَلَى جُيُوبِهِنَّ }
chapter.eng-name: Regarding The Statement Of Allah And To Draw Their Khimars Over Juyubihinna
